scripts.dev: docker rm -f local_ai_workspace && docker run -p 15432:5432 -v ./data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -e POSTGRES_USER=local_ai_workspace -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=local_ai_workspace -e POSTGRES_DB=local_ai_workspace -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata --name local_ai_workspace local_ai_workspace
